trail.content_raw: I saw spider man yesterday and it was incredible
trail.content: I saw spider man yesterday and it was incredible

body:
Be Alright (Tom Holland x reader)

A/N: this is a short, sad and probably bad imagine to announce my comeback 🙌🏼

Warnings: swearing, grammar mistakes? Angst. Flashbacks are on italics

————————————————

“I know you love her, but it’s over, mate” I couldn’t stop looking at the screen of my phone waiting to recieve the message that said it was all a joke “It doesn’t matter, put the phone away” Harrison took the device from my hands and shove it in his pocket.

“I just… It’s… Harry, I can’t believe it” I cover my face with my hands

“It’s never easy to walk away. Let her go. It’ll be okay” He says sitting opposite from me.

“I thought she was the one. How could I be so fool?” Anger in my voice. I took a glass on mu hands ands smashed it to the ground, tearing it to pieces. A sigh comes out of Harrison’s mouth. Again my hands cover my face and I press my back to the counter. That fucking counter. Slowly I start descending until my ass hits the floor. Seconds later I feel Harrison sit next to me.

“Tom… I’m sorry. I truly am. I also thought she was the one. But apparently she wasn’t. So how about we go to a club? Bottoms up, let’s forget the night. Let’s forget about her.” A palm laid on my shoulder. It gave warmth to my back. But it also felt like hers.

“I’m not on the mood, Harry”

“Tom I get it. It’s gonna hurt for a bit of time. But You’ll find another and you’ll be just fine… Let her go" He made a pause “It’s gonna be alright”

A few seconds of silence went by. I looked up to meet his eyes. And as if I were a child seeking for reassurance I said

“Promise?”

Harrison smiled down at him. He had never seen his best mate so vulnerable like he was right now. And he prayed he never had to see him like this again.

“Promise”.

We both got up from the floor and Harrison went to grab his car keys. I just stared at the package of cigarettes left on the counter.

“Baby? I’m home!” I said loudly so that (Y/N) could hear me. As I didn’t get an answer I figured she would be taking a shower or something, so I went up to our room. As I passed the kitchen I spotted a package of cigarettes. I think it’s weird but then I remember (Y/N) texted me a friend of hers was coming over so I just let it be and kept walking to our room. Once I was there I look up and I meet her eyes all teared up. I stopped dead on my track. Why was my baby crying? “Wh- What’s wrong?” I said as I got closer to her. As I went to cup her face on my hands she looked away. Something is wrong. I try to grab her hand but it’s cold. And she pulls it out of my grasp again.

“I made a dumb mistake… a horrible one” a tear rolling down her cheek. She starts to tremble and her voice begins to break. “The cigarettes on the counter. They weren’t from my friend. “ And I barely make out the next thing that comes out of her lips. “ They were your mate’s”

And I feel the color draining from my face.

I grab them and put them on my pocket. They’ll be useful later.
